Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.12 Rūpāvacaraduka » 13.12.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.12.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.12.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Rūpāvacaraduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
262.
4646Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta…pe…  nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
